scripts.deploy-local: && npm run deploy-configure && npm run deploy-cache && npm run deploy-wout-cache && npm run deploy-invalidate
scripts.deploy-configure: source .env.production_deploy . && aws configure set aws_access_key_id $AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID --profile docsProdProfile && aws configure set aws_secret_access_key $AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY --profile docsProdProfile
scripts.deploy-cache: source .env.production_deploy . aws s3 sync dist "s3://${S3_BUCKET}/" --cache-control max-age=31536000 --region us-east-1 --exclude=smart-nfts-spec.json --profile docsProdProfile
scripts.deploy-wout-cache: source .env.production_deploy . && aws s3 sync dist "s3://${S3_BUCKET}/" --cache-control no-cache --region us-east-1 --profile docsProdProfile
scripts.deploy-invalidate: source .env.production_deploy . && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id $DISTRIBUTION_ID --paths "/*" --region us-east-1 --profile docsProdProfile
